attributes.action: replace the unfair Council Tax with a tax that is based on people's ability to pay, such as a local income tax.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The Council Tax system is manifestly unfair because:  1) only householders pay it;  2) it victimises people for factors which are completely outside their control, namely the astronomical rises in house prices over recent years; 3) it discriminates against pensioners whose pensions have not even increased in line with average earnings, let alone with house prices.

It has always been accepted as fair that individuals should fund central government in accordance with their ability to pay, namely through income tax.  The same principle should apply to the funding of local government.
